Name: Grotoro
About the game: GRO... TO... RO... GROTORO!!! GROTORO is a multiplayer couch space globular fatty nervous farting bull brawl in space. Reflex, timing, precision, courage, endurance, tactics, feints, coalitions, treachery, charisma, tenacity, manipulation, power... Here are all the qualities you must have to be the greasiest Grotoro! Features: 4 players epic battles! Play with AI if you don't have enough friends Speed control Blobby Volley style: from 50% to 200% Fully editable controls Use the 'Yaaa' (dash) to hurt and kill your opponents Master the 'Ol√©' to dodge opponents attacks... Bounce on screen borders to hit them with style Hide behind your fat balls to trick other players Dash into others Grotoros' dash to perform an epic counter Bouncy interface Instant fun: 0 tuto, 0 story, 0 loading Be the last and greasiest Grotoro! Who let the bulls out? Who, Who, Who, Who, WHO? Recommandation: best played with X360 or XOne gamepad! Follow Concrete Games: Concrete Games Newsletter Steam Profile Discord Twitter Instagram Facebook Website Credits: Game Design & Programing by @MatoLabu Visuals, Music & Sound by @Tomavatars Guest: 3D bulls modeling by @retmia from @ImmaterialStu
